title: Connecting Multiple Devices With Blockchain In The Internet Of Things
abstract: The scope of this research paper is “Connecting multiple devices with blockchain in the Internet of Things (IoT)”, and it intends to give a literature overview. Please be aware that this survey paper in no way is intended to be an extensive/complete overview of blockchain as an enabling technology for the IoT. The authors have selected a couple of interesting applications of blockchain in the IoT, and dive into these applications in more detail.
